alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Cobb; DeKalb; Douglas; North Fulton; Paulding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Paulding, northwestern DeKalb, Cobb, northeastern Carroll, northern Douglas and central Fulton Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 200 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Sandy Plains to near Villa Rica, and moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Marietta, Douglasville, City of South Fulton, Sandy Springs, Roswell, Smyrna, Dunwoody, Villa Rica, Powder Springs, Chamblee, Doraville, Austell, Temple, Hiram, Lithia Springs, Fair Oaks, North Atlanta, Mount Bethel, and Vinings. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Cobb; DeKalb; Douglas; North Fulton; Paulding
